page.title: 08 Recipe for Cornish Pasty.
page.content: {For Pastry:}250g plain flour, 65g lard, 60g margarine. {For Filling:}Thinly sliced potatoes, thinly sliced swede, thinly sliced onion,125g skirt or chuck steak. {Method:}Rub fat into flour until it is like bread crumbs. Mix with a little cold water until you get a stiff dough. Roll out pastry into a circle. Put on layers of potatoes ,swede,meat and onion. Add salt and pepper. Fold pastry over to make a semi-circular "package". Crimp the edges by holding the edge with your left hand and bring the edge towards you with your right thumb to form a "rope". Slit the top with a knife and then brush egg white over. Put it on a tray and pop it into a very hot oven for about 10 minutes. Turn it back to hot and bake for a further 35 mins.
